H0.text: Helium is the gas released by plants growing in a pond that fish need to survive.

H1.text: Hydrogen is the gas released by plants growing in a pond that fish use to survive.

H2.text: Nitrogen is the gas released by plants growing in a pond that fish use to survive.

H3.text: Oxygen is the gas released by plants growing in a pond that fish use to survive.

A4.text: Oxygen is produced by biotic photosynthesis.

A5.text: Oxygen is released as a byproduct.
